Class Ext.ux.form.FileUploadField

Package:Ext.ux.form
Defined In:ux-all-debug.js
Class:FileUploadField
Extends:Object
Creates a file upload field.

 buttonOnly : Boolean
True to display the file upload field as a button with no visible text field (defaults to false). If true, all inher...
True to display the file upload field as a button with no visible text field (defaults to false). If true, all inherited TextField members will still be available.
FileUploadField

True to display the file upload field as a button with no visible text field (defaults to false). If true, all inherited TextField members will still be available.

 buttonText : String
The button text to display on the upload button (defaults to 'Browse...'). Note that if you supply a value for butto...
The button text to display on the upload button (defaults to 'Browse...'). Note that if you supply a value for buttonCfg, the buttonCfg.text value will be used instead if available.

Public Events

EventDefined By
 fileselected : ( Ext.ux.form.FileUploadField this, String value )
Fires when the underlying file input field's value has changed from the user selecting a new file from the system fil...
Fires when the underlying file input field's value has changed from the user selecting a new file from the system file selection dialog.
Listeners will be called with the following arguments:
  • this : Ext.ux.form.FileUploadField
  • value : String
    The file value returned by the underlying file input field
